alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:05PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Jackson and southern Franklin Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 205 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Huntland, or 13 miles south of Winchester, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Cowan, Hytop, Maxwell, Belvidere and Jericho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
